name: ITS INTERACTIVE <3 by n0t4numb3r & princess tuti

metadata.name: LOVE BOX
metadata.description:
"Love Box" is an interactive work entirely created with code. 
Fun to play with & full of love <3

How to play? 

~ Click on the screen with the mouse or touch to create  
 a new heart 💗  
~ Keep pressing the mouse or finger to create 
continuous hearts 💗💗💗  
~ To interact and play with the hearts click & drag them around 
~ To delete hearts double click or tap them 
~ press 'f' to clean the canvas and start from scratch

<3 <3 <3 <3

perfect for gifting to your loved ones on Valentine's Day 💝😉

Created with love by n0t4numb3r & Princess Tuti ✨
